attributes.action: Butt Out -Make cigarette manufacturers change cigarette filters to neon pink
attributes.additional_details: Dangerous for wildlife as well as us. Billions are dumped analysis worldwide. Groups suggest placing further smoking bans but if they were more visible i feel it would help people to notice what they leave behind.
attributes.background: Cigarette butts litter streets, beaches containing carcinogenic chemicals that leach out.Discarded without a second thought. The current flesh colour hasn't changed in many years, blending in not standing out. If  more obviously visible it would deter people from smoking and casually dumping butts.
